message: I'm excited to offer you the product at a price of $1,200,000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere.
Alice, that price is a bit too high for me. I'm interested, but I could only consider a price closer to $800,000.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, but $800,000 is still a bit below my minimum. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $1,000,000. This is my final offer for now.
